item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, November 18, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud fs (29 points | 18 comments)
2. A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor (47 points | 25 comments)
3. Museum of Bad Art (132 points | 73 comments)
4. Reactive HTML Notebooks (184 points | 31 comments)
5. The Skyline algorithm for packing 2D rectangles (10 points | 1 comment)
6. LLaVA-O1: Let Vision Language Models Reason Step-by-Step (76 points | 9 comments)
7. Show HN: Nova JavaScript Engine (180 points | 64 comments)
8. Libobscura (41 points | 1 comment)
9. Phonetic Matching (42 points | 12 comments)
10. November 1861: Chalmers' under Channel railway (9 points | 1 comment)
11. Fortran II Hypersource (47 points | 4 comments)
12. GaussianAnything: Interactive Point Cloud Latent Diffusion for 3D Generation (53 points | 6 comments)
13. Against Best Practices (106 points | 89 comments)
14. Show HN: Tips.io – A Tailwind playground with AI, page management, and theming (9 points | 3 comments)
15. Electron Spins: a special case of Chromium mods (20 points | 7 comments)
16. Reverse Engineering iOS 18 Inactivity Reboot (445 points | 131 comments)
17. Air traffic failure caused by two locations 3600nm apart sharing 3-letter code (16 points | 27 comments)
18. Nordic neighbours release new advice on surviving war (20 points | 5 comments)
19. Show HN: Documind – Open-source AI tool to turn documents into structured data (90 points | 26 comments)
20. The withering dream of a cheap American electric car (73 points | 343 comments)
21. It's time to replace TCP in the datacenter (2023) (162 points | 106 comments)
22. AlphaProof's Greatest Hits (231 points | 123 comments)
23. Faking Shaders III: Tixyland (22 points | 5 comments)
24. Show HN: Dumbo – Hono inspired framework for PHP (36 points | 30 comments)
25. Show HN: The App I Built to Help Manage My Diabetes (167 points | 65 comments)
26. Solar-powered desalination system requires no extra batteries (87 points | 28 comments)
27. You could have designed state of the art positional encoding (183 points | 29 comments)
28. Mapping the Ionosphere with Phones (82 points | 12 comments)
29. Teen behind hundreds of swatting attacks pleads guilty to federal charges (164 points | 259 comments)
30. I was banned from the hCaptcha accessibility account for not being blind (2023) (214 points | 133 comments)
